participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Nervous and cautious, especially about things like insects.
participant_1.background: i'm terrified of scorpions. i am employed by the us postal service. i've a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and energetic, loves sports but struggles with academics.
participant_2.background: i'm on the soccer team. my brother is older than me. i ride the bus to school. i am 13 years old. i hate math class.

content.text: I was just wondering if you have any pets?
I've a dog named Roscoe. What is it that you do?
I see. What do you do for a living?
